name: GenerateReleaseNotes
description: Generates a release notes file in a format of your choice
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: outputfile
inputs.label: Output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown file to export e.g. $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)\releasenotes.md if within a build workflow

inputs.name: outputVariableName
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that the markdown output should be assigned to for use later in your workflow.

inputs.name: templateLocation
inputs.label: Template Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the template file source, file in source control or in line.

inputs.name: templatefile
inputs.label: Template file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown template.

inputs.name: usedefaultcreds
inputs.label: Use default credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will use the credentials of the running agent as opposed to access token provided by build service.

inputs.name: emptySetText
inputs.label: Text for empty sets
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the text that will be placed in the generated release notes if there are no work items or changesets/commits.

inputs.name: generateForOnlyPrimary
inputs.label: Generate for only primary artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will generate release notes for the primary build artifact (Release usage only)

inputs.name: generateForCurrentRelease
inputs.label: Generate for only this Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will generate release notes for this release (Release usage only)

inputs.name: overrideStageName
inputs.label: Name of stage (override)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set uses this stage name to find the last succesful deployment, as opposed to the currently active stage (Release usage only)

inputs.name: maxWi
inputs.label: Maximum Work Items to return
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum Work Items to return in the report

inputs.name: maxChanges
inputs.label: Maximum Changeset/Commits to return
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum Changeset/Commits to return in the report

inputs.name: wiFilter
inputs.label: List of Work Item types to include
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-separated list of Work Item types to include in the report. Use this to exclude Tasks, for instance.

inputs.name: wiStateFilter
inputs.label: List of Work Item states to include
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-separated list of Work Item states to include in the report.
